I.name: Death in Lavender
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Bel'Veth''' attacks 36% faster than the median champion and her attack speed cap is modified to 90, but all sources of damage (including {{tip|on-hit}} effects) dealt or triggered by her basic attacks are reduced to 75%. Her {{as|attack speed}} does not increase through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]].

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Bel'Veth's''' [[champion ability|ability]] casts each generate 2 [[stack]]s of ''Death in Lavender'' on her resource bar, which lasts 5 seconds, refreshes on basic attacks and subsequent casts, and stacks up to 6 times. While '''Bel'Veth''' has stacks, she becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|{{as|{{pp|25 to 50|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}. Her [[basic attack]]s each consume 1 stack.

{{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Bel'Veth''' scores a {{tip|takedown}} against a {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|monster}} within 3 seconds of damaging them, she generates a permanent stack of ''Lavender''. Large monsters generate 1 stack, champions and epic monsters generate 2 stacks.

{{sbc|Lavender:}} For each stack, '''Bel'Veth''' gains {{as|{{pp|0.25 to 1.25|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Bel'Veth attacks 36% faster than the median champion and her attack speed cap is modified to 90, but all sources of damage (including on-hit effects) dealt or triggered by her basic attacks are reduced to 75%. Her attack speed does not increase through Growth#Increasing_Statistics.
Innate: Bel'Veth's champion ability casts each generate 2 stacks of Death in Lavender on her resource bar, which lasts 5 seconds, refreshes on basic attacks and subsequent casts, and stacks up to 6 times. While Bel'Veth has stacks, she becomes ghosted and gains 25% − 50% (based on level) bonus attack speed. Her basic attacks each consume 1 stack.
Innate: Whenever Bel'Veth scores a takedown against a champion or monster within 3 seconds of damaging them, she generates a permanent stack of Lavender. Large monsters generate 1 stack, champions and epic monsters generate 2 stacks.

Lavender: For each stack, Bel'Veth gains 0.25% − 1.25% (based on level) bonus attack speed.
I.notes: * ''Death in Lavender's'' {{tip|takedown}} effect will not trigger against monsters if they were slain by an enemy.

Q.name: Void Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Bel'Veth''' {{tip|dashes}} in the designated direction, though not through terrain, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies she passes through and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and [[ability effects|spell]] effects at 75% effectiveness to the first target hit. ''Void Surge'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and deals 120% damage to {{tip|monsters}} and modified damage against {{tip|minions}}.

''Void Surge'' can be cast only within a cardinal direction that is off cooldown, and incurs a {{sti|cooldown}} between casts. Each cardinal direction has a unique {{sti|cooldown}} that is reduced equivalent to {{fd|0.25}} [[ability haste]] per {{tt|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}|Benefits from all sources of bonus attack speed except the temporary bonus from Death in Lavender}}. These cooldowns reset upon [[death|respawning]].
''Void Surge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Bel'Veth's''' basic attack timer.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Bel'Veth dashes in the designated direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through and applying on-hit and ability effects effects at 75% effectiveness to the first target hit. Void Surge can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage and deals 120% damage to monsters and modified damage against minions.
Void Surge can be cast only within a cardinal direction that is off cooldown, and incurs a cooldown between casts. Each cardinal direction has a unique cooldown that is reduced equivalent to 0.25 ability haste per 1% bonus attack speed. These cooldowns reset upon death.
Void Surge resets Bel'Veth's basic attack timer.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Monster Damage|{{ap|10*1.2 to 30*1.2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110*1.2}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Modified Minion Damage|{{ap|60 to 100}}%}}
Q.notes:
* The icon partially darkens based on the combination of dashes available. When all dashes are expended, the cooldown indicates the next available dash.
* While in {{ai|Endless Banquet|Bel'Veth|True Form}}, ''Void Surge's'' dash distance is extended up to {{tt|225|Pending for test}} units when targeted across terrain.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* ''Void Surge'' can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and {{tip|block|blocked}} only as the first enemy hit.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 110% AD)
  • Monster Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Modified Minion Damage: %

W.name: Above and Below
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Bel'Veth''' slams her tail down in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for a duration.
If this hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}, it {{sti|cdr|resets}} ''{{ais|Void Surge|Bel'Veth}}'' dash cooldown of the target direction.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Bel'Veth slams her tail down in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, knocks them up for 0.75 seconds, and slows them by 50% for a duration.
If this hits an enemy champion, it resets Bel'Veth's Void Surge dash cooldown of the target direction.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow Duration|{{ap|1.25 to 2.25}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 125% AP)
  • Slow Duration:

E.name: Royal Maelstrom
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Bel'Veth''' enters a defensive stance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she is unable to move, but gains {{sti|life steal}} and 70% {{tip|damage reduction}}.

During this time, she rapidly slashes at the nearest enemy with the lowest {{as|'''current''' health}} percentage for up to 6 (+ 1 per {{tt|{{as|{{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% '''bonus''' attack speed}}|Benefits from all sources of bonus attack speed except the temporary bonus from Death in Lavender}}) times over the duration. Each slash deals {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 300 for 11|0 to 100|formula=3% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}, and applying {{tip|on-hit}}, {{tip|on-attack}}, and [[Ability effects|spell]] effects at {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|6 to 24 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.18% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}} effectiveness.
''Royal Maelstrom'' deals 150% damage to {{tip|monsters}}, {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness, and cannot {{tip|critically strike}}.
''Royal Maelstrom'' can be recast after {{fd|0.75}} seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when '''Bel'Veth''' casts an ability.
''The target does not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be hit by this ability.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Bel'Veth enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, during which she is unable to move, but gains life steal and 70% damage reduction.
During this time, she rapidly slashes at the nearest enemy with the lowest current health percentage for up to 6 (+ 1 per 33.Unknown value: recurring / 3% bonus attack speed) times over the duration. Each slash deals physical damage, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined, and applying on-hit, on-attack, and Ability effects effects at 0 to 100 ‒ undefined effectiveness.
Royal Maelstrom deals 150% damage to monsters, applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness, and cannot critically strike.
Royal Maelstrom can be recast after 0.75 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or when Bel'Veth casts an ability.
Recast: Bel'Veth ends Royal Maelstrom.
The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability.
leveling: {{st|Life Steal|{{ap|20 to 28}}% (+ {{tt|100% life steal|Does not apply to the life steal gained from Royal Maelstrom}})}}

{{st|Minimum Physical Damage per hit|{{ap|8 to 20}} {{as|(+ 6% AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage per hit|{{ap|8*4 to 20*4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6*4}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Monster Damage per hit|{{ap|8*1.5 to 20*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6*1.5}}% AD)}}|Maximum Monster Damage per hit|{{ap|8*4*1.5 to 20*4*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6*4*1.5}}% AD)}}}}
E.notes:
* ''Royal Maelstrom'' does not prioritize champions over other units.
* '''Bel'Veth''' cannot attack [[structure]]s, [[ward]]s, nor [[jungle plants]] with ''Royal Maelstrom''.
* If '''Bel'Veth''' is {{tip|berserk|berserked}} or {{tip|taunt|taunted}}, she will slash at the unit she is forced to attack.
* Each slash's damage triggers a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Bel'Veth''' is performing ''Royal Maelstrom'':
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts|consume=true|spells=true,interrupts,false,false,true|interrupts=death}}

R.name: Endless Banquet
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Bel'Veth's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack {{tip|on-hit}} against the marked target deals {{ccs|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}|true}} and generates a stack of ''Endless Banquet'' that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic {{tip|monsters}}. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.

{{sbc|Passive:}} When '''Bel'Veth''' scores a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} or epic {{tip|monster}} while alive, a ''Void Coral'' is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds. {{ui|Baron Nashor}} and pit {{ui|Rift Herald}} spawn an ''Enhanced Void Coral''.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Bel'Veth''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target ''Void Coral'' to consume it over the cast time, {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal {{as|true damage}} to enemies within and assumes her {{sbc|True Form}} for 60 seconds.
'''Bel'Veth''' consumes all existing ''Void Corals'' at once, generating a stack of ''{{ai|Death in Lavender|Bel'Veth|Lavender}}'' for each one consumed.

{{sbc|True Form:}} '''Bel'Veth''' evolves into a monster, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} [[combat status|out-of-combat]], {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}}, as well as increased {{as|'''total''' attack speed}}. ''{{ai|Void Surge|Bel'Veth}}'' can {{tip|dash}} through [[terrain]]. Consuming a ''Void Coral'' {{tt|refreshes|See notes}} the duration of {{sbc|True Form}} and {{tip|heal|heals}} '''Bel'Veth'''.

{{sbc|Enhanced Void Coral Bonus:}} {{sbc|True Form}} is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes ''Void Remora'' to spawn from {{tip|minions}} that die nearby.

''A nearby Void Coral is required to cast this ability. The {{tip|on-hit}} modifiers from {{ai|Death in Lavender|Bel'Veth}}, {{ai|Void Surge|Bel'Veth}} and {{ai|Royal Maelstrom|Bel'Veth}} affect the {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} applied by Endless Banquet's passive. See [[Bel'Veth/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for details about Void Remora and Void Corals.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Bel'Veth's basic attacks on-hit apply a mark to the target for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Every second attack on-hit against the marked target deals bonus true damage / true">Unknown value: ccs / bonus true damage / true and generates a stack of Endless Banquet that increases this damage by the same value. This effect stacks infinitely, but is capped at 5 stacks against epic monsters. The mark and stacks expire upon attacking a new target.
Passive: When Bel'Veth scores a takedown against an enemy champion or epic monster while alive, a Void Coral is spawned from their corpse for 15 seconds. Baron Nashor and pit Rift Herald spawn an Enhanced Void Coral.
Active: Bel'Veth dashes to the target Void Coral to consume it over the cast time, slowing nearby enemies by 25% ramping to 99% over the duration. She then creates an explosion at the location to deal true damage to enemies within and assumes her True Form for 60 seconds.
Bel'Veth consumes all existing Void Corals at once, generating a stack of Bel'Veth's Lavender for each one consumed.
True Form: Bel'Veth evolves into a monster, gaining bonus health, bonus movement speed combat status, bonus attack range, as well as increased total attack speed. Bel'Veth's Void Surge can dash through terrain. Consuming a Void Coral refreshes the duration of True Form and heals Bel'Veth.

Enhanced Void Coral Bonus: True Form is empowered to last 180 seconds and causes Void Remora to spawn from minions that die nearby.
A nearby Void Coral is required to cast this ability. The on-hit modifiers from Bel'Veth's Death in Lavender, Bel'Veth's Void Surge and Bel'Veth's Royal Maelstrom affect the bonus true damage applied by Endless Banquet's passive. See Bel'Veth/LoL#Pets for details about Void Remora and Void Corals.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus True Damage|{{ap|6 to 10}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|6*5 to 10*5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|12*5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25 to 35}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
R.notes:
* Applies {{tip|proc damage}} on the bonus true damage and deals {{tip|area damage}} on the explosion.
* ''Endless Banquet's'' {{tip|takedown}} effect will not trigger against monsters if they were slain by an enemy.
* ''True Form's'' duration is refreshed based on the type of ''Void Coral'' that '''Bel'Veth''' consumes.
** Consuming a normal ''Void Coral'' in a normal ''True Form'' state refreshes the duration to 60 seconds.
** Consuming an enhanced ''Void Coral'' refreshes the duration to 180 seconds and grants the enhanced effects regardless of current ''True Form'' state.
** If she consumes a normal ''Void Coral'' while in an enhanced ''True Form'' state, the duration is refreshed to 60 seconds only if the remaining duration is below that amount. The enhanced effects are '''not''' lost in this case.
* '''Bel'Veth''' will consume all existing ''Void Corals'' at once, therefore she is able to acquire the enhanced effects of ''True Form'' even if she does not physically consume an enhanced ''Void Coral''.
* The ''Void Coral'' that '''Bel'Veth''' consumes herself will not expire in the process of her doing so.
* '''Bel'Veth''' will consume all other ''Void Corals'' upon consumption regardless of range.
* Ranking up ''Endless Banquet'' will update the bonuses dynamically; if '''Bel'Veth''' has ''True Form'' upon the level-up, she will receive the upgraded stats.
* '''Bel'Veth''' gains the '''bonus''' health and heal from ''Endless Banquet'' at the start of the cast time.
* '''Bel'Veth''' will be able to consume the target ''Void Coral'' even if her dash is interrupted.
** She dashes at the start of the cast time.
* A ''Void Coral'' will '''not''' spawn when scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against a summoned {{ui|Rift Herald}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Bel'Veth''' is in cast time:
** She remains locked out for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the cast time completes.
{{ct|cast=false|move=false|attack=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false|interrupts=revival-false}}
